title: What are some good universities in India from which I can get an online MBA degree? - Quora

response.answer_text: More apt choice of words for "Online MBA", would be distance learning. Learning is not online, but exams are and lectures are also more on digitized platform. But make no mistake study material to learning every single thing is via big bulky books similar to what you get in fulltime MBA colleges. The only difference here are that you will not get an faculty to clear your doubts. Distance learning is more of self learning and take pain understanding the concepts on your own. Both degrees from Fulltime and Part time are equally valid. But in a degree like MBA/PGDBA the place you are graduated from matter because of the placement and grooming you get from there. But my friend, understand man introduced the concept of "degree" and not the other way round. Some good universities for Distance Education and ranking based on learning are as below Rank	Name of the Institution1	Symbiosis Centre for Distance Learning2	IMT Distance & Open Learning Institute3	Sikkim Manipal University4	UP Rajarshi Tandon Open University5	Yashwantrao C. Maharashtra	Open University6	Indira Gandhi National Open University7	Karnataka State Open University8	Netaji Subhas Open University9	Madurai Kamaraj University (DDE)10	Alagappa University (DDE)10	University of Madras (IDE) Source:https://university.careers360.com/articles/top-distance-education-universities-in-india-2012

Below are the best universities for online MBA Degree : Institute of Management Studies (IMT) GhaziabadSymbiosis Center for Distance Learning (SCDL)Indira Gandhi National Open University (IGNOU)ICFAI UniversitySikkim Manipal UniversityAnnamalai UniversityNarsee Monjee Institute of Management StudiesWelingkar Institute of ManagementAmity UniversityLovely Professional University
